'''Jay Wells''' is a Community Manager for ''[[Minecraft]]'' at [[Mojang Studios]], and was formerly the [[Mojira]] Community Coordinator.

== About ==
Jay's current job consists of assisting with management of the Mojira bug tracker and internal bug reporting tools, writing Minecraft changelogs, along with other community management responsibilities.
